message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $100 for it.
I understand that $120 is a bit high for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $90 for the product.
I'm still a bit far from your budget, Bob. But I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $105.
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $95 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can offer it to you for $115.
I understand that you're getting close to your minimum price, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'd be willing to pay $100 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $110, Bob. This is my final offer.
I understand that this is your final offer, but I'm still not comfortable paying $110. I'm willing to walk away and buy the product from John for $80 if we can't come to an agreement.
